title: Under level 30 players more toxic in normal games?
body:
Just something i've noticed. A majority of the players I run into in normal games that start flaming/inting/what have you are under level 30

Anyone else notice this or am I just being nitpicky?

replies.body: A lot of the newer players coming from other games don't realize that their behavior is unacceptable until they are punished for it. Some of them are probably also second accounts of people who have been permanently banned.
Also a lot of them tend to be banned "smurfs"
They are, but I don't blame them. Every game they play in has shitty matchmaking because Riot doesn't care about normals.
My smurfing to 30 experience has been almost devoid of any toxicity. So I'd say you're nitpicking. Also what Zezockary said.

Its usually when im on my main or smurfs and get a level 25-29 in my normal who just hardcore flames/thinks they know everything

Weird. Glad yours was better

people who are lv30 do care about getting banned.
people who are under lv30 and new to the game do care about getting banned.
people who are under lv30 (smurf accounts) dont give a $#@! about getting banned since they can just make another account ~~n most of them tend to be bronze 4 or 5 smurfs~~
